If Gamepad Button Pressed: With this action you can poll the gamepad to see if any button is currently being pressed. The action will return true every step that the gamepad button is being pressed (and held) down, or false otherwise, although if you click the not modifier you can then check to see if the button is not being pressed, ie: the action will return true while no button is pressed and false if there is. If you only need to check for a single button press then use the action if gamepad button down.
If the button being checked is an analogue button, then the press will not be detected until the button value has gone above the threshold set using the action Set Gamepad Button Threshold.
